backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles with access control, wallet validation, and profile CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and component layer definitions including OKLCH theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React application entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup with routing, theme provider, authentication checks, and profile gate.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing copyright info, caffeine.ai attribution, and social links.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, login/logout handling, profile dropdown, and Play Game button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: React form for entering and saving a user's display name using saveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/game/match3/engine.ts: Core Match-3 engine implementing board generation, swapping, match detection, clearing, and related helpers.
frontend/src/game/match3/types.ts: Type definitions and constants for Match-3 tiles, board, matches, and swap results.
frontend/src/game/match3/useMatch3Game.t: React hook managing Match-3 state, tile selection, swaps, scoring, cascades, and restart logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query wrappers for fetching and mutating user profile and wallet address via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup plus custom CSS variables, dark theme, and game tile interaction rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectWallet.tsx: Page for authenticated users to view, link, update, or remove a stored crypto wallet address with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Renders the matchâ€‘3 game board, handling tile selection, animations, scoring, and restart via the useMatch3Game hook.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home screen showing branding, welcome message, and entry points to authentication features and the Stone Match game.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the UI theme.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project version, features, visual requirements, and current development state.
